name: MPJ02A25 MENS PANJABI - Coffee
description: Men’s Panjabi by Haya Mart – a perfect blend of style and comfort. Made from 100% premium cotton, it’s lightweight, breathable, and soft, ensuring all-day ease, especially in summer. Plus, its color stays vibrant even after multiple washes.

name: Royal Blue Panjabi
description: Crafted with premium cotton blend, this royal blue panjabi gives a rich, bold look. Ideal for cultural programs or special events, it adds sophistication and style with minimal effort.

name: Jet Black Panjabi
description: An elegant black panjabi designed for the modern gentleman. Its sleek finish and tailored fit make it perfect for evening wear, Eid occasions, or family gatherings.

name: Olive Green Panjabi
description: Made from soft cotton-linen mix, this olive green panjabi offers both comfort and durability. The subtle shade and fine stitching give it a classy and sophisticated appeal.

name: Maroon Luxury Panjabi
description: A luxurious maroon panjabi designed with intricate embroidery on the collar and cuffs. Made from rich fabric that feels smooth on the skin, making it ideal for weddings or special ceremonies.

name: Navy Blue Panjabi
description: This navy blue panjabi offers a perfect blend of tradition and modernity. Lightweight, breathable fabric ensures comfort during long festive days and special events.

name: Cream Cotton Panjabi
description: Soft cream cotton panjabi with minimalistic design. Perfect for hot weather and casual occasions. The fine cotton texture gives a graceful and elegant appearance.

name: Sky Blue Panjabi
description: A refreshing sky blue panjabi crafted from breathable cotton. Its soothing color and simple design make it perfect for both everyday wear and religious occasions.

name: Ash Grey Panjabi
description: A smart ash grey panjabi for a contemporary look. Tailored with attention to detail, this piece ensures a sharp and confident appearance for any social gathering.

name: Golden Beige Panjabi
description: This golden beige panjabi reflects luxury and class. Designed with subtle detailing on the collar, it is ideal for formal programs and traditional events.

name: Forest Green Panjabi
description: A deep forest green panjabi with a rich texture and strong stitching. Designed for those who prefer bold yet traditional tones for special occasions.

name: Silver Grey Panjabi
description: A soft and elegant silver-grey panjabi made from breathable cotton. Its light tone gives a premium, calm look ideal for Jummah or Eid wear.

name: Mustard Yellow Panjabi
description: A bright mustard yellow panjabi perfect for festive days. The soft cotton fabric and stylish collar detailing make it stand out in any crowd.

name: Chocolate Brown Panjabi
description: Made from rich fabric with a deep brown hue, this panjabi gives a royal look suitable for evening wear or traditional events.

name: Teal Blue Panjabi
description: A unique teal blue panjabi combining elegance and comfort. Crafted from high-quality fabric that stays cool and soft even after long wear.
